data.title: Software Engineering Intern
text: Constructed dockerized RESTful API using Kotlin and the Spring Boot framework for company web and mobile applications.
Designed and implemented a relational database with MariaDb that leverages Liquibase for migration handling.
Improved code readability by refactoring redundancies in various microservices with generic Kotlin methods and Spring annotations for dependency injection.

data.title: Software Engineering Intern
text: Developed web application for corporate internal communication and information storage using Microsoft Power Platforms.
Improved efficiency of feature deployment by implementing CI/CD pipelines in Microsoft Azure for cloud-based automation.
Coordinated bi-weekly sprints using Agile practices for deployment of application features and project timeline forecasting.

data.title: Software Engineering Intern
text: Streamlined visualization of production output by developing a Python app that displays brix produced per minute in real-time using the Tkinter GUI library.
Maintained quality control for the production line by manually operating SIG Combibloc filling machine in aseptic conditions.
Drafted preliminary quality assurance protocols by creating electrical directives derived from Thai manuals.

data.title: Software Engineering Intern
text: Acquired experience in implementation of REST APIs and designing systems architecture for web applications.
Created several iterations of corporate intranet website by restructuring JavaScript web components.
Facilitated weekly conferences to ensure the development process among various teams is synchronously aligned and allocated Jira tasks accordingly.

data.title: Mechanical Engineering Intern
text: Created technical directives to update machine manuals for the STORK heat treatment equipment in replacement of obsolete cleaning-in-place systems.
Led daily briefings with mechanical teams to coordinate progressive installation of STORK.
Worked with the mechanical team in daily maintenance of aqueduct systems.
